column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm not sure why people rave about this place - food is mediocre. I've been coming for years
column2: it was better 10 yrs ago - the quality of the food has diminished
column3: seems more fast food - churning out lots of product for the masses. Today we ordered deviled eggs
column5: they tasted ok; got the empanada
column7: spicy potatoes (which were super salty and too much paprika) but the worst was we ordered the grilled octopus and upon arriving at the table you could smell the octopus was bad!!! Â The waitress came over to check on us and she could smell the bad octopus! She took it off the bill
